location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Excerpts of despatch No.31 from Her Majesty's Secretary of State for India

mods.abstract: The excerpts are from Paragraphs six and seven of the despatch and credit Colonel Pelly with the settling of differences between the Sultan of Muscat and the Wahabees [Wahabis] and approving Pelly's recommendations should any future disagreements arise between them.
